Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a car object that can be animated to move forward by changing the value of x-position of all the parts

Version:
(10/11/15)
Author:
Alex Arnold

Constructor Summary
Car(int x, int y, int w, int h)
          Constructs car with a given top left corner and predetermined width and height
 
Method Summary
 void changeXPos(int x)
          Animates the car by changing the value of the x-position of the components that make up the car
 void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          Draws the body of the car and the two wheels based off of values passed in to the parameters in the CityscapeComponent Constructor

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Car

public Car(int x,
           int y,
           int w,
           int h)
Constructs car with a given top left corner and predetermined width and height

Parameters:
x - the x-cord of the top-left corner
y - the y-cord of the top-left corner
w - the width of the car (along the x axis)
h - the height of the car (along the y axis)
Method Detail

changeXPos

public void changeXPos(int x)
Animates the car by changing the value of the x-position of the components that make up the car

Parameters:
x - how many pixels the car will move per second (to the right)

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Draws the body of the car and the two wheels based off of values passed in to the parameters in the CityscapeComponent Constructor

Parameters:
g2 - the graphics context
